content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various paths, but all resulted in "No such file or directory" errors. I tried to activate the environment using the path "/home/kat/anaconda3/bin/activate" with the command "conda activate arcgis", but it did not work. I then attempted to activate the environment using the command "bash -c 'source /home/kat/anaconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\"'", but it also resulted in a "No such file or directory" error. The latest development shows that executing the command resulted in a "No such file or directory" error.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/kat/anaconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/kat/anaconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
